If you are using Windows for your O.S., then why don't you use Microsoft Security Essentials? It is free and updated for free. Also it is less intrusive than any of the other anti-malware. It is made for Windows.

I think there is some truth that it can actually induce/aggravate panic disorder and magnify anxiety. I friend of mine has this problem when he tokes. Also my son years ago tried it at a dance years ago and he was in a big panic. He called me to take him home. I did not know what was going on. He did eventually tell me that he smoke some weed, for the first time and was very paranoid and panicky. I talked him into going for a walk until it started to wear off telling him that some people just can't handle it and he seemed fine with that. He manged to get his shit together and I drove him back to the dance. We have never talked about that night since then and to this day he realizes that he cannot smoke pot without having these awful feelings. I was so glad that he felt comfortable letting me in his life at the time he needed someone. I did not lecture him or punish his behaviour in any way. He was a young teenager and I was one also. Yes I think that pot can have this effect on some people.
